title: South African VR Analytics Lab - Analysis Report
insights: Top performing region: Gauteng with R19,743,000 revenue
Top performing category: Electronics with R40,254,000 revenue
Total business value: R45,843,000 across 4200 units sold
Average order value: R10,915 per transaction
recommendations: Focus on expanding KwaZulu-Natal market - currently underperforming
Leverage success in Electronics category for cross-selling opportunities
Invest in digital marketing for underperforming regions
Develop customer retention programs to increase average order value
